products.title: Verona Blackout Vintage Blush Roller Blind
products.metadescription: With its light blush tone, the pink fabric of this cheerfully stylish blackout roller blind is the perfect way to inject a little colour into your scheme. This blush pink shade is ideal for modern spaces, complementing grey shades beautifully for that subtle but bright look

products.title: Palace Vintage (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure palace vintage (blackout) blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm
 	min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
